attributes.action: Church land returned to the State so that more affordable housing can be built.
attributes.background: In the past royalty and the wealthy were scared and black mailed into giving land and money to the church in return for their sins to be forgiven so that upon their death they could avoid hell. Kings should not have given state lands away and they should now be returned for the benefit of the state.

rejection.details: It would be for the Church of England to decide whether to return its land to the state.
